evidence.claim: Direct Care Innovations utilizes AWS cloud services to host and manage applications.
They implement FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Direct Care Innovations handles X12 transaction sets for claims processing and eligibility verification.
Amazon RDS is used for their database management needs.
Direct Care Innovations states their compliance with HIPAA regulations in their technology stack.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on health data exchange and integration, relevant to X12 and API-driven healthcare solutions.
